TopicTitle: [AAR] The Grand Tour - Voyage To The Planets

Articles.Content:
UPDATE

Extra raw footage from the chapter 44

For some reason, it doesn't work. Oh well, I guess I'll give you footage from between the chapter 44 and chapter 45 (the next one) in this case: why it's not working?

EDIT: I guess I found a reason why the images don't show up - have too many of them. More than 2000 right now So I have to manually put them here:

Edited November 21, 2013 by czokletmuss

Oh no. THE KRAKEN'S EATEN KERBIN!

GET THE KERPLOW!!!

Or kill it with jeb

Sometimes I forget that you actually have to play the game in order to make the chapters, that they don't just come out of your head but also from what happens while you're playing. Seeing the "behind the scenes" pictures makes the story that much more amazing. Great job on every chapter czokletmuss, I always check back here multiple times a day eagerly waiting for the next chapter!

GET THE KERPLOW!!!

I didn't know we had one of those.

I'm quite busy IRL right now but I'm still aiming for update this weekend.

Just sayin'.

Thanks to you, I'm now about to start my own Grand Tour.

If all goes well, I may actually write a story like you.

Thanks for being a inspiration.
Thats one beast of a ship!

If I tried to make that my game would die.

Also, Henry, you follow this too? Sweet.

I'm pretty sure nearly everyone on this forum follows it.

And on a more relevant topic, yea, my largest ship is the Kerbol, here's a pic.

Guys, this is not a political thread - let's focus on the story, okay? We don't want to make mod angry by breaking the forum rules:

2.2 Forbidden content

Messages which contain or link to the following are explicitly forbidden: (...) Discussions of a political, ideological or religious nature
My bad, The mods already don't like me because of Kerbal Powers.

My bad, The mods already don't like me because of Kerbal Powers.

That wasn't your fault, I don't think it was anyway, it was just 2 people, maybe by accident, maybe not. Saying we, the great might (INSERT NAME OF EMPIRE HERE)...

Thank you and good luck, writing is fun And holy crap, this ship is big!

Thanks, I designed the ship with a mission to go everywhere, with a couple of twists.

One, Kragathea's Planets are included in the Grand Tour.

Two, no payloads, landers, stations, or anything of that sort, may be sent ahead of the ship, meaning only what is attached to the ship when it leaves Kerbin's SOI, are the only things that will ever be used on the mission.

Three, attempt as many landings as possible, the only planet/moon not planned to have a landing is Sentar's moon Thud, which has a gravity three times that of Kerbin, no atmosphere, and an escape velocity of 6.5 KM/s.

And this is my mission plan.

I'm going to stop dumping my stuff into your thread now.

Keep on making your story amazing.

Why only two days of school?

Also I live in Europe, free healthcare, low crime, low powerty, high (and free) education, no lunatics whit guns, paid retirement and much much more. HAHAHAHAHA

You know, I kinda got screwed over. Moved to Texas from Washington (STATE, NOT WASHINGTON D.C.). Did you know Texas is the 49th state in the nation on school spending?

Also, the weather right now is complete SH*T. 36 degrees fahrenheit (about 2 degrees celsius). Texas is NOT this cold at this time of year, so once you acclimate, it's AWFUL.

I miss Washington sometimes.

Also, the weather right now is complete SH*T. 36 degrees fahrenheit (about 2 degrees celsius). Texas is NOT this cold at this time of year, so once you acclimate, it's AWFUL.

For once, someone actually lives in "Washington" as in "state" just like me, and not "Washington" which instantly implies "D.C." otherwise.
Okey-dokey, I'm done with what I had to do urgently IRL, so expect next chapter really Soon.
